# Nezahualcóyotl

## Overview

Nezahualcóyotl (Ciudad Neza) is a municipality in the State of Mexico, part of Greater Mexico City.

## Key Facts

- **Country**: Mexico
- **Founded**: 1963 AD
- **Elevation**: 2,235 meters
- **Area**: 63 km²

## Notable Features

Nezahualcóyotl was built on a drained lakebed and is one of the most densely populated municipalities in Mexico.
